scripts.android:local: MOTO=$(adb devices -l | grep model:moto_e13 | grep -v '^adb-' | head -n1 | awk '{print $1}'); SAMSUNG=$(adb devices -l | grep model:SM_A546E | grep -v '^adb-' | head -n1 | awk '{print $1}'); [ -n "$MOTO" ] || { echo "Moto e13 no encontrado en adb"; exit 1; }; [ -n "$SAMSUNG" ] || { echo "Samsung A54 no encontrado en adb"; exit 1; }; cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleDebug -x lint && cd ..; adb -s "$MOTO" reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081; adb -s "$MOTO" uninstall com.safemindai || true; adb -s "$MOTO" install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk; adb -s "$MOTO" shell am start -n com.safemindai/.TutorLauncher; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" uninstall com.safemindai || true; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" shell am start -n com.safemindai/.TutorLauncher
scripts.android:local:clean: MOTO=$(adb devices -l | grep model:moto_e13 | grep -v '^adb-' | head -n1 | awk '{print $1}'); SAMSUNG=$(adb devices -l | grep model:SM_A546E | grep -v '^adb-' | head -n1 | awk '{print $1}'); [ -n "$MOTO" ] || { echo "Moto e13 no encontrado en adb"; exit 1; }; [ -n "$SAMSUNG" ] || { echo "Samsung A54 no encontrado en adb"; exit 1; }; cd android && ./gradlew clean app:assembleDebug -x lint && cd ..; adb -s "$MOTO" reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081; adb -s "$MOTO" uninstall com.safemindai || true; adb -s "$MOTO" install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk; adb -s "$MOTO" shell am start -n com.safemindai/.TutorLauncher; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" uninstall com.safemindai || true; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk; adb -s "$SAMSUNG" shell am start -n com.safemindai/.TutorLauncher
scripts.android:apk:release:clean: cd android && ./gradlew clean app:assembleRelease -x lint && cd ..
